questions.quote: You know, George, just because your life is destroyed, don't destroy someone else's.
Is there anything wrong with getting a receipt at a toll booth?
Well, we've got to do something.  I'm calling Giuliani's headquarters.
The other day after work some girlfriends and I went to a bar for some drinks and there was this crazy mishap and I wound up meeting someone as a result. George...
George what the hell are you doing over there? I told you to mind your own business now stay out of my affairs!
Yeah, I eat the whole apple. The core, stem, seeds, everything.
I'd stayed up all night I'd fixed myself up a little before I'd go out.
You know who - isn't here. He was in the early class today.  But I think you made quite an impression on him yesterday.
Well, don't press the panic button. I'm sure that we can still salvage some sauce..
Ok, fine. It's going to be very interesting, very interesting if they don't show up tonight. You know my mother made all this Paella.
